function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Incorporation of evaporation effects in the calculation of transmission distance","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inclusion of research studies on the behavior and transmission of smaller droplets","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improving ventilation systems and using air purifiers","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improving ventilation effectiveness and air distribution in indoor spaces","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Careful calibration of the infective quantum using real pandemic case data and verification with actual infection rates","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research and establish precise guidelines for safe social distancing based on factors such as particle size, environmental conditions, and ventilation","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement and enforce ventilation rate guidelines for confined spaces, improve ventilation systems, and integrate air purifiers","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct comprehensive research to establish clear correlations and guidelines for social distance, ventilation rate, and probability of infection, implement monitoring systems to track and control pi","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Public education on the importance of proper social distancing","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous review and update of social distancing guidelines based on research","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide sufficient transportation resources and arrange seats at a minimum distance of one meter","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement regular and accurate testing methods for covid-19 and combine with other preventive measures such as masking and social distancing.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mandate daily body temperature screening and self-health assessment for all workers in the offshore workplace.","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prioritize the use of highly sensitive testing methods such as rt-pcr and naat for workers in enclosure areas like oil and gas offshore platforms.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Providing a quarantine facility and conducting diagnostic tests before entry into the workplace","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing engineering control, administrative control, and ppe measures in combination","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting individual risk assessments to determine the appropriate ppe for each worker and providing necessary training on proper usage","category":"Use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaborating with hotel service providers to offer isolation and quarantine rooms, seeking approval from local health authorities, and implementing alternative quarantine measures","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proper communication of surveillance measures, addressing privacy concerns, and providing clear guidelines for self-quarantine protocols","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide handwashing stations with soap and alcohol-based hand rub dispensers","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure good ventilation by maintaining fresh air delivery and regulating humidity levels","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement administrative controls including online meetings, shift arrangements, and training on covid-19 protocols","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement a system for monitoring and tracking covid-19 cases and contacts, and ensure compliance with quarantine and isolation protocols","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement engineering controls, administrative controls, and ppe to reduce the risk of transmission","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Install physical barriers and signage to direct worker traffic and maintain physical distance in narrow areas","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immediate isolation, testing, and evacuation of infected workers; close contact tracing and quarantine procedures","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement work-from-home policies for workers with comorbidities, and grant exemptions only to essential workers with proper risk assessment and medical recommendations.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Record passengers’ name logs and seat numbers to facilitate contact tracing in case of a confirmed covid-19 case within the workforce.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement mandatory pre-employment and periodic medical check-ups for all offshore workers","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforce strict compliance with medical check-up requirements and consequences for non-compliance","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular training, education, and monitoring of covid-19 prevention guidelines and protocols","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing social distancing measures, regular disinfection of surfaces, and providing personal protective equipment","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reducing pob density, implementing regular testing and health screenings, and enhancing ventilation systems","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Remote work arrangements, flexible scheduling, and vaccination programs","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular disinfection of surfaces, especially those with high contact","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of alcohol-based disinfectants, regular cleaning of metal surfaces","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular disinfection of surfaces, use of personal protective equipment ppe for aerosol protection","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use disinfectants with alternative ingredients, follow safety guidelines for use","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use appropriate concentrations, follow safety guidelines for handling","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide clear guidelines and training on cleaning and disinfection protocols","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide clear guidelines for surface disinfection based on virus behavior","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular testing, contact tracing, public health education","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of approved hospital-grade disinfectants, clear guidelines on disinfectant use","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular disinfection of metal surfaces and proper ventilation to reduce aerosol transmission","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular disinfection of metal surfaces and maintenance of social distancing","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of safer alternative disinfectants, proper ventilation when using chemical disinfectants","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent disinfection of surfaces, use of protective barriers, and promotion of hand hygiene.","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Widespread testing, contact tracing, and public health education on asymptomatic transmission.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multiple disinfectants with different mechanisms of action, regular assessment of disinfection practices, and implementation of enhanced cleaning protocols.","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enforcement of regulations to limit human intrusion into untouched ecologies and wildlife habitats","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"High"}]}
